name: Vineghast Calling
desc:
You call upon the vengeful spirits of the dead to give life to a vineghast, a fearsome creature bearing multiple weapons. It takes its turn after yours, and while you concentrate on this spell, it obeys your mental commands.

If you stop concentrating on this spell, the vineghast breaks free from your control, and spends all its turns moving to and attacking the nearest creature for the remaining duration of the spell.
author: CrusaderDroid
